Name: Power of Women meeting
Lokacja: Cultural center in Nowa Dƒôba, ≈ªeromskiego 2 street
LongDescription:
Nowodƒôbska Rada Kobiet (translated to: The Women's Council of Nowa Dƒôba) invites you to the second meeting in the series: THE POWER OF WOMEN: "Pink inspirations: the power of knowledge and support in the fight against breast cancer." üé§ 

The meeting will be devoted to breast cancer prevention and supporting people who are sick or have had the disease. Together, we want to share knowledge, inspire action and the strength we draw from being together.

üé§ Interview with Justyna Gamo≈Ñ Weso≈Çowska - clothing designer, president of the GA MON Artistic Foundation, owner of Atelier GA MON Justyna Weso≈Çowska, organizer of Nadwi≈õla≈Ñski Fashion Week.

üé• Recorded speech by Justyna Kwa≈õnik - linergist (micropigmentation specialist), nurse, owner of JK Visage.

üè•Speech by Urszula Bubrowska - Director of the District Hospital in Nowa Dƒôba: "Rehabilitation possibilities in the conditions of the daily rehabilitation unit for patients after mastectomy."

‚ù§Ô∏è Dorota Bielecka - Coordinator of the Mental Health Center,

‚ù§Ô∏è Monika Majka ‚Äî psychologist, psychotherapist

‚ù§Ô∏èEwa W√≥jtowicz and ‚ù§Ô∏èPaulina Konefa≈Ç - care coordinators, employees of the reporting and coordination point of the psychiatry department at the Independent Public Complex of Health Care Facilities in Nowa Dƒôba:

‚ÄúHow to deal with an unwanted diagnosis? Forms of support for you and your loved ones.‚Äù

This is a great opportunity to ask questions, exchange experiences and be inspired to take action. We are all in this together, and time together is not only a dose of knowledge, but also great emotional support.

üë≠ Come alone, with family, friends - let's be together on this day!

Let's be pink inspirations for each other. üå∑

See you! üéâ

The meeting is held in Polish.

Description:
I am experienced and creative furniture designer, with 10 years of experience, whose passion is creating unique and functional furniture tailored to the individual needs of customers.

I specialize in creating advanced visualizations for carpenters and others. Thanks to my skills and experience, I can translate clients' visions into realistic and detailed designs that facilitate the process of producing custom-made furniture.

My work supports carpenters at every stage of implementation, providing precise plans and visual guides that minimize the risk of errors and maximize customer satisfaction.

Are you a carpenter or a private person? Do you need visualization and a detailed design? Feel free to contact me!
